titles.title: To amend the Safe Drinking Water Act to provide for research on methods to combat biological contamination of public drinking water supplies, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Science, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Energy and Commerce
Referred to the Subcommittee on Environment, Technology, and Standards.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Environment and Hazardous Materials.

term.name: Federal aid to water pollution control

bill.summary: 11/1/2001--Introduced. Amends the Safe Drinking Water Act to direct the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to make grants to organizations, and enter into contracts and other arrangements with any person, to conduct research into methods to combat the biological contamination of public water supplies.
